One question though: Will the Command Module be shiny, as it is on the real one? There's a plugin that can make things reflective, but I'm not too sure if it works with .23

Except for Voskhod, that is

Maybe MrTheBull will make that. It's not too big of a stretch. An inflatable airlock, a new, 2-3 Kerbal IVA for Vostok pod and the retropack would be all that that'd needed. Perhaps also adding an integrated parachute to Vostok pod would be good, but that'd be useful for Vostok itself, too, since it did have a parachute, even though the pilot was supposed to eject.
Will the Apollo CSM be 3.75m or 2.5m? 2.5m would be 64%, IIRC, so that would actually kinda make sense.

Amazing!

One question though: Will the Command Module be shiny, as it is on the real one? There's a plugin that can make things reflective, but I'm not too sure if it works with .23

i'd like to create some cool parts for my own pack. But i have no idea what people would like to see in KSP) =D

Hmm, I'd say finish the Apollo CSM first, then, if you want to, make a Saturn I-B. The Saturn I-B was used to launch the Apollo CSM when it was used for Skylab crew transfers.

Fun fact: the Saturn I-B wasn't capable of putting a fully fueled Apollo CSM in orbit, so they drained about half the fuel out of it. It didn't need it anyway, when it wasn't going to the Moon.

EDIT: Oh, and MrTheBull, there is a small inaccuracy in the Angara pack. The ANGARA 5P isn't going to use fuel crossfeed - it will activate the radial boosters first, and only when they are burnt out and dropped it will activate the center stage.

Edited January 9, 2014 by wasmic
